attributes.action: Stop using the phrase 'under the last Labour governement' during PMQs.
attributes.additional_details:
Questions to the Prime Minister are an essential part of British politics in provide an open forum to hold the Prime Minister accountable.

The descent into childish behaviour has spiralled of late, to the point where answers can be barely audible, if answers are provided at all.

Please sign this petition if you are in favour of enforcing the answering of questions, and restoring honourable debate for the sake of the British public, and not allow the Prime Minister to use constant reference to the last government as a retort.
